txt.en: 'The warriors will bear these packages of food south to the wars.'
'I am tying these bundles with strong twine. I am good with knots.'
'Some of your Ranger friends are helping me with these.'
'I have been wrapping these bundles for most of the day!'
'Some of these bundles are quite heavy, but our warriors will manage.'
'Lheu Brenin would not anger Saruman if he thought we could not defend ourselves.'
